ModMetaData.name: Passion Tweak
ModMetaData.author: Vis
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to tweak the learning rate of each passion level (no, minor, and major). RimWorld default is: 0.33, 1.00, 1.50. This mod's default is: 1.00, 1.25, 1.50.
Each value can be set to any value between 0 and 1,000,000,000. Note that extremely high values may cause issues, and is not something that I can change.
